price: 2. Oo aad aragto dadka oo u soo galaya diinta Alle (Islaamka) rac-rac (kooxo),
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
